title: Ece vs cse (rr)? Seniors pls advice
content:
I've seen many posts saying that ece in pes is lacking and students who get placed end up at an it job anyway,

Im interested in electronics more than cse but I was wondering what the right choice
Seniors from both branches pls share your knowledge

comments.body: Not all students end up in IT there are a few core job offers as well along with the option to do masters in ece...
